actions.description: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

traits.description: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.
traits.name: Dark Devotion

traits.description:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith

2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon
traits.name: Spellcasting
